document.full_text: an oxford academic has found a "tantalizing" link between shakespeare's tragic heroine ophelia and a real-life girl who died at the age of two in 1569, when the bard would have been around five years old.
document.title: oxford academic finds "tantalizing" clue to ophelia
lines_and_colors: an oxford academic has found a "tantalizing" link between shakespeare's tragic heroine ophelia and a real-life girl who died at the age of two in 1569, when the bard would have been around five years old.
